word: IN 1862 SHE WROTE: "PHRENOLOGY AND MESMERISM ARE VERY MUCH EXALTED. THEY ARE GOOD IN THEIR PLACE, BUT THEY ARE SEIZED UPON BY SATAN AS HIS MOST POWERFUL AGENTS TO DECEIVE AND DESTROY SOULS. HIS ARTS AND DEVICES ARE RECEIVED AS FROM HEAVEN, AND FAITH IN THE DETECTOR, THE BIBLE, IS DESTROYED IN THE MINDS OF THOUSANDS" (TESTIMONIES, VOL. 1, P. 296).
